description: Non-material amendment to planning permission (ref: 2020/00300/FUL) dated 22 November 2023: for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and redevelopment of the site in the form an 18-storey building (plus part lower-ground floor) with two connected 7-storey elements, providing a mix of residential apartments, office space and co-living accommodation, together with associated co-living amenity space and facilities, workspace and a ground floor cafe/ restaurant; new public realm, pedestrian access landscaping and associated works.Amendments to Condition 2 (drawings) to allow for changes to the balustrades on the southern elevation increased in height from a height of 1100mm to 1400mm on Level 07 opposite the railway line; and the introduction of a bulkhead at the lower ground floor.
site_name: 227 Wood Lane And Browning House, Wood Lane LondonW12 0DG
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
